Hi, I’m Nicki

a.k.a HairyblueGithub

A Software Developer that craft digital experience.

PhilippinesResumeLet’s Connect

Back in 2021, I decided to switch my course from Management Accounting to Computer Science. At the time, I wasn’t computer literate—I did’t even know how to do a simple copy-and-paste to a USB flash drive. But as I continued studying my new course, I developed a keen interest in coding and discovered a real passion for software development.

Learning to code wasn’t easy at first, but i stuck with it and gradually enjoy the challenges. Started as simple curiosity eventually turned into solid commitment to improve and grow.

Now, with over 1.10 years of work experience as a software developer. I’ve had the opportunity to work on real-world project and learned whats in a practical settings.

“Code is the language of freedom in the digital realm”
